results.brief_description: This instructional film was written by the English Test Cricketer, W.J. Edrich (Middlesex and England), who also gives the demonstrations, and speaks the commentary.

results.title: How to paint like a professional: a complete guide to interior painting.
results.brief_description: A practical guide to handy tips and techniques to achieve a professional interior painting job in your home. Terms like acrylic, enamel, pigment and sealer are clearly explained. Advice is given on the choice of paint, roller and brush, surface preparation, patching cracks, protecting floors and furniture, paint application, cleaning up after the job and storage of excess paint.

results.title: How to organise your own music event (PC)
results.creator_credit: Songlines Music Aboriginal Corporation, AUSMUSIC, Global Vision, Rory Sutton, Malcolm Smith and Diane Robbie
results.brief_description: Organise your own musical performance with the assistance of Rocky the Roadie. The CD ROM covers all details in the organisation of a musical performance, including budgeting, choosing the right venue, promotion and fundraising. The CD is based on a module ‘How to Organise Your Own Music Event’, which is part of AUSMUSIC’s Certificate 2 in Music Industry Skills. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC with 486 DX2/66 or higher, 640x480 display with 256 colors, 8 MB RAM, 16MB of free hard drive space, 4 speed CD ROM drive, Microsoft Windows 3.1 or a later version, and Video For Windows. A 140 page student workbook plus teacher notes accompanies the CD ROM and provides an overview to the piece as well as a glossary of terms, references and useful contacts.

results.title: How to negotiate a great salary package
results.brief_description: What this video lacks in glamorous production values, it more than makes up for in practical tips to negotiate the salary package you want from your employer. The program is in two segments, the first presented by Judy Rose who is experienced in negotiation skills. The second segment is presented by Mike Taylor of Prime Time Financial Counsellors who gives sound financial advice on options within salary packages. Produced for the Australian Institute of Training and Development.

results.title: How to make the famous pisco sour
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
results.brief_description:
‘Pisco Sour’ represents a shift beyond earlier works in its dense layering of subject-matter and imagery. Initiated in Australia and completed in Japan, the work draws upon the core imagery of a bullock dray, a male figure in silhouette, a Japanese mask and a bottle of Pisco Sour. These appear in varied permutations alongside other seemingly random images to form a series of telescopic views (screens within screens). Verbal narrative and textual statement create a sense of tension whilst suggesting that history and meaning are never fixed. The work presents something of a conundrum, its title a metaphoric recipe for the potential ‘souring’ of things.

Produced with the assistance of the Visual Arts Board of the Australia Council.
Notes by Rachel Kent, reprinted courtesy of the author and d/Lux Media Arts.

results.title: How to make an American quilt
results.creator_credit: Amblin Entertainment, Sarah Pillsbury, Midge Sanford and Jocelyn Moorhouse
results.brief_description: Winona Ryder shines in this deeply moving and touchingly funny story of a Berkeley graduate student Finn (Ryder) who spends the summer at the home of her sparring Grandmother (Anne Bancroft) and great aunt (Ellyn Burstyn). Their house is a quiet haven where she intends to finish her latest thesis and think over a marriage proposal. This beautifully filmed tale brings unbridled passion, true love, betrayal, joy and heartbreak vividly to life in a captivating cinematic tapestry that celebrates finding your way and following your heart. Based on the novel by Whitney Otto.

results.title: How to make a truck
results.brief_description: Looks at the relatively small scale manufacture of trucks for specialized applications in the United States. Provides a simple but comprehensive explanation of the assembly line and the entire process of truck production.
